name: Sukhe Dukkhe Organisation
briefDescription: We are very happy to express Sukhe Dukkhe Organisation, is a Non-Governmental Organization working for the all round development of People. Sukhe Dukkhe Organisation is mainly concentrate on Women Empowerment, Child Development Programmes. We teach the street children and poor children about their school syllabus and teach them various extracurricular activities i.e. drawing, recitation, stitching, handicraft and computer.
